title: IPartDoc.ImportDiagnosisGapCloser
description: Allows you to repair a gap by moving the vertices on the edges surrounding the gap to new positions to close the gap on the imported model.
signature:
void ImportDiagnosisGapCloser( 
   System.Double
OldX
,
   System.Double
OldY
,
   System.Double
OldZ
,
   System.Double
NewX
,
   System.Double
NewY
,
   System.Double
NewZ
,
   System.Boolean
LastMove
)
